events.title: Simon Chrisman & Nic Gareiss - Live In Concert
events.description: Simon Chrisman & Nic Gareiss mesh time and timbre to create dynamic performances of music and dance!
events.details: #Simon Chrisman & Nic Gareiss# [Nic Gareiss](https://www.nicgareiss.com/) (percussive dance, bouzouki, vocals) and Simon Chrisman (hammer dulcimer) met in 2007 at a fiddle festival in the Californian redwoods and have been exploring sound and movement together ever since. Both innovators on their instruments, [Nic and Simon](http://www.facebook.com/simonchrismanandnicgareiss) bring their unique approaches together for traditional song, percussive dance, instrumental tunes, improvisation and new compositions, engaging interlocking rhythms and dynamic textures. Well-known for his work with the groundbreaking new acoustic string band The Bee Eaters, Simon's music combines ‚Äúchamber music‚Äôs finely calibrated arrangements with bluegrass‚Äôs playful virtuosity and pop music‚Äôs melodic resourcefulness.‚Äù (Boston Herald) Noted for his ‚Äúdexterous melding of Irish and Appalachian dance‚Äù (New York Times) and described as ‚Äúthe most inventive and expressive step dancer on the scene‚Äù (Boston Herald), Nic has performed with many of the luminaries of contemporary traditional music and dance, including The Chieftains, The Gloaming, Phil Wiggins, Liz Carroll, Bruce Molsky, Bill Frisell, Alasdair Fraser and Natalie Haas. Together, Nic and Simon adventure into the world of time and timbre to create a breathtaking evening-length performance of song, instrumental music, and percussive dance.
events.price:
General Admission $25 at venue / $20 adv online ‚Üí
Students/Seniors $20 at venue / $15 adv online ‚Üí
events.price_note: Also combo tickets available including Appalachian Flatfooting Dance Workshop Sun 2/3 11am.

events.title: The Reluctant Saint - movie
events.description: Special Film Presentation of the 1962 movie ‚ÄúThe Reluctant Saint‚Äù starring Maximilian Schell, Ricardo Montalban and Lea Padovan. 1h 44m.
events.details:
[The Reluctant Saint](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0056403/): Maximilian Schell stars as ‚Äúthe flying friar‚Äù, St. Joseph of Cupertino, in this heartwarming and amazing true story of the humble Franciscan friar who literally rose to sainthood in the impoverished village of 17th century Cupertino, Italy. Joseph‚Äôs peasant mother convinces the reluctant Abbott (Ricardo Montalban) to accept her son into the monastery and by a series of miraculous incidents, the simple but pious Joseph is ordained a priest. Yet some are convinced that it is the devil,not God, who is responsible for Joseph‚Äôs miraculous powers ‚Äì until a final miracle reveals to all, his true sanctity.


PERSONAL NOTE FROM SAHADEV (event producer)

I‚Äôm setting up this event with a triple purpose:
1) To inspire! ‚ú®
2) As a fundraiser for JCA! Please be generous. üòä
...we do have a license from the publisher to present this film üëçüèª
3) To celebrate my birthday with as many people as possible!

See you there!

Sahadev üíñ

events.title: Spring Equinox Sound Ceremony
events.description: A meditative sound healing ceremony by Edward Maesen with a collection of acoustic instruments and voice.
events.details:
#Edward Maesen# [Edward Maesen](https://epvm.name/) is a Mount Shasta local. He offers sound healing sessions and canvas prints of his photography art of Mt Shasta.

From an early age he has been aware of the multi-dimensionality of his being and found refuge in the Stillness Within. He now uses sound to assist others enter that state of harmony and peace. His sound sessions have been referred to as ‚Äúgalactic shamanism‚Äù and ‚Äúcelestial initiation‚Äù.

With over thirty years experience in the healing arts, he studied many different modalities and distilled his own unique method from that.

Through the ceremonial use of sound with acoustic instruments and his voice,
he reflects the state of your true Being,
inviting and allowing you to enter a state of harmony and peace,
revitalizing and reinforcing your connection to Self,
inviting you to remember and realize All that Is ‚Äì The Ultimate ‚Äì Awareness beyond being.


Let the sounds guide you into the Stillness
Enter the Kingdom Within
And Be
Love


Edward offers private sound healing sessions in Mount Shasta (by donation - for individuals, couples and small groups up to 6 people):
[Mount Shasta Sound Healing](https://MountShastaSoundHealing.com/)

events.title: The Secret Beach on Tour
events.performer: Micah Erenberg (The Secret Beach), Matt Jolliff
events.description: The Secret Beach is the moniker used by Canadian artist Micah Erenberg, whose refreshingly plainspoken candor has become a dominant through-line in the singer/songwriters ever-expanding catalog. With special guest Matt Jolliff.
events.details:
#The Secret Beach# Everyone loves a secret: a shortcut through the woods, a fishing hole, a beach.

![Micah Erenberg](micah-erenberg-m.jpg)I‚Äôm at [the Secret Beach](https://www.thesecretbeach.ca/) now, and I‚Äôm reminded that it‚Äôs been years since Micah Erenberg merged into the rocks and trees and sand that line this endless spine of a beach ‚Äì a beach that arches out of an inland ocean like a giant waking from a marshy sleep. How he did this, I can‚Äôt tell you. But it came to him as if by revelation: if place is being, then you must become that place: become the Secret Beach: become a firmament for sunny summer days: become a place where you feel like you belong, a place that reminds you of home, a place that is home. And so he became the beach. This is what the Songs from Secret Beach do, too ‚Äì they can shatter and scatter you into the winds, they can peer into you as if you were glass, they can weather the edges of your broken bottles. And they allow for others ‚Äì like me ‚Äì to reflect. You can hear them easier out here. Listen. Put your ears to the ground. Do you hear it? Each grain of sand sings a secret song. Each one is no less important than another. I hear billions around me. A chorus of melodies swarm along the shoreline. This must be how Micah makes his songs ‚Äì he simply nets them as if they were butterflies.

I walk into the lake, sinking into a sandbar: it‚Äôs smooth and cool against my feet. I‚Äôm up to my waist in the Secret Beach‚Äôs dark waters. I stare back at myself through the ripples that radiate around me. Each song is a tree ring. Like a record player, I curl my finger into a stylus and lower it carefully into the wavy grooves below. ‚ÄúMiss You‚Äù plays, ‚ÄúGod is‚Äù plays. I‚Äôm reminded of the smell of balsam poplar buds, and the way they stick to your toes. It‚Äôs a memory that the music has freed, and it carries me to shore. As far as I can tell, there‚Äôs no one around, and so I sing along, kicking at the water with an intoxicated abandon. 

This is the secret of the Secret Beach: you get to make your own meaning, your own purpose. Through songs that blend the personal and universal, the Secret Beach encourages that meaning-making ‚Äì and in doing so, makes some spectacularly great music.

But don‚Äôt tell anyone I told you that. That‚Äôs between you and me. 

- [The Famous Sandhogs](https://thefamoussandhogs.bandcamp.com/)

events.title: The Clements Brothers
events.description: The Clements Brothers, George (guitar) and Charles (bass), combine their love of music in a rich blend of harmony and melody with original songwriting and instrumental skill.
events.details: #The Clements Brothers# [The Clements Brothers](https://www.theclementsbrothers.com/) are George and Charles Clements, identical twins from New England. They‚Äôve been playing and writing music together for as long as they can remember and ‚ÄòThe Clements Brothers‚Äô marks their first project together since playing in the internationally touring grass-roots band, ‚ÄòThe Lonely Heartstring Band‚Äô with whom they put out two albums on Rounder Records. With roots, rock, bluegrass, jazz, and classical influences, George (on guitar) and Charles (on bass) aim to capture their singer-songwriter sensibilities in a unique blended voice, at once enthralling and intimate, groovy and serene. They are joined by drummer Mike Harmon, who joined the band after an impromptu late night set at the Ossipee Music festival, and adds his unique roots-conscious musicality to the group's evolving sound.  The trio is a fusion of each member's unique musical journey, and the result is music all its own, filled with vocal harmonies, instrumental virtuosity, and a genuine love of song.
events.price:
General Admission $25 at venue / $20 adv online ‚Üí
Students/Seniors $20 at venue / $15 adv online ‚Üí

events.title: JCA comedy night with Mike Betancourt
events.performer: Mike Betancourt, Dustin Wood, Nick Meier
events.description: The JCA is stoked to host this special celebrity comedy night with MIKE BETANCOURT!
events.details:
Energetic. Animated. Outrageous. These are just a few of the words that describe multi-faceted performer and creator [Mike Betancourt](https://www.mikebetancourt.com/), the comedian, actor, writer and producer. As a comedian, Mike tears up stages all around the nation and creates new fans wherever he goes.

JCA Comedy Night will feature Dustin Wood and the evening will be hosted by ‚Äúfunnyman‚Äù Nick Meier.

Special guest TBA :)
